Room.Name: Thieve's Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are crawling along a narrow passage that is pitch dark.
Room.LongDescription: This part of the passage is much wider than the part going east, but it's still only big enough for two. There is a sound of a rusty door being moved coming from the north. The sound isn't constant, but comes and goes. It's difficult to stand in here, and you certainly wouldn't want to get in a fight in this cramped space.
